select class_score, c.class_id as classId, c.class_name as className, c.class_score as classScore, capacity, enrollment, d.depart_name as departName from open_class join class c on c.id = open_class.class_record join department d on c.depart_id = d.depart_id
and c.class_id = #{classId}
and c.class_name like concat('%', #{className}, '%')
and d.depart_name like concat('%', #{departName}, '%')

select t.teacher_id, t.teacher_name, t.position, d.depart_name as departName from open_class join class c on c.id = open_class.class_record join teacher t on open_class.teacher_id = t.teacher_id join department d on c.depart_id = d.depart_id where c.class_id = #{classId} and depart_name = #{departName}

SELECT DISTINCT t.*,d.depart_name as departName FROM teacher t JOIN department d ON t.depart_id = d.depart_id WHERE d.depart_name = #{departName} AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM open_class o JOIN class c ON o.class_record = c.id WHERE c.class_id = #{classId} AND o.teacher_id = t.teacher_id )
